remixlab.remixcam.constraint
Class Constraint

java.lang.Object
  remixlab.remixcam.constraint.Constraint
Direct Known Subclasses:
AxisPlaneConstraint
public class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object

An interface class for Frame constraints.

This class defines the interface for the constraint that can be applied to a Frame to limit its motion. Use GLFrame.setConstraint(Constraint) to associate a Constraint to a Frame (default is a null GLFrame.constraint().

Constructor Detail

Constraint

public Constraint()
Method Detail

constrainTranslation

public Vector3D constrainTranslation(Vector3D translation,
                                     GLFrame frame)
Filters the translation applied to the Frame. This default implementation is empty (no filtering).

Overload this method in your own Constraint class to define a new translation constraint. frame is the Frame to which is applied the translation. Use its GLFrame.position() and update the translation accordingly instead.

translation is expressed in the local Frame coordinate system. Use GLFrame.inverseTransformOf(Vector3D) to express it in the world coordinate system if needed.

constrainRotation

public Quaternion constrainRotation(Quaternion rotation,
                                    GLFrame frame)
Filters the rotation applied to the frame. This default implementation is empty (no filtering).

Overload this method in your own Constraint class to define a new rotation constraint. See constrainTranslation(Vector3D, GLFrame) for details.

Use GLFrame.inverseTransformOf(Vector3D) on the rotation Quaternion.axis() to express rotation in the world coordinate system if needed.
